label: thm-canonical-logistic-validity
name: The Canonical Logistic Function is a Valid Rescale Function
statement: The **Canonical Logistic Rescale Function** defined in def-canonical-logistic-rescale-function-example satisfies all four conditions of the **Axiom of a Well-Behaved Rescale Function** (def-axiom-rescale-function).
subsection: 8.3.2. Theorem: The Canonical Logistic Function is a Valid Rescale Function
key_result: Canonical logistic function g_A(z) = 2/(1+e^{-z}) satisfies all axioms with L_{g_A} = 1/2 and g_{A,max} = 2
relations_established: Canonical logistic rescale function satisfies all axiom requirements
